articles.title: Reception Given by Indonesian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Indonesian Ambassador
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- Nasri Gustaman, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Monday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Indonesia.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Indonesian embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Pays Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the China Institute of Contemporary International Relations visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to accomplishing the human cause of independence and boosting the DPRK-China friendship and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Arrives Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Arrives Here
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China Institute of Contemporary International Relations headed by Vice-President Fu Mengzi arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Workers' Party of Bangladesh Pays Respects to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Workers' Party of Bangladesh Pays Respects to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Bangladesh in its 9th Congress paid highest respects to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and expressed full support to the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The decision of the congress said:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Bangladesh paid highest respects to the great leaders Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il who founded the Juche idea, the great guiding idea in the era of independence, turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power through their outstanding Songun leadership and made immortal contributions to the socialist cause and the human cause of independence.
					
					 We will hold memorial services in humblest reverence with sincerity on the occasions of the 20th anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung and the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Bangladesh highly appreciates the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the DPRK, for successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It congratulates the Korean people, who are rallied around Kim Jong Un in one mind, on their great successes in the work for developing the economy and improving the people's standard of living despite all obstructive moves of the hostile forces, filled with confidence in the final victory.
					
					 It extends full support and solidarity to the struggle of the WPK and the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation, achieving the independent reunification of the country and defending peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 16th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues in boundless reverence for the peerlessly great men who clearly indicated the road to be followed by the Juche-based medical science and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Youth League in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Youth League in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Korean Youth League in Japan headed by Vice-Chairman Kim Tu Sop visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation laid bouquets before the graves of the President's grandparents Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik and his parents Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 They visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where the historic data and relics showing the revolutionary activities of the President and his family members are displayed.
					
					 Being briefed on stories associated with the old home in Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Kim Tu Sop said:
					
					 Mangyongdae is the native home dear to the hearts of not only the Koreans in the homeland but compatriots in Japan.
					
					 The President, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and liberated the country, saved Koreans in Japan from the fate of statelessness and put forward them as overseas citizens of the independent and sovereign state.
					
					 We will give a steady continuity to the lineage of patriotism and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Okryu Children's Hospital, etc.

articles.title: Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Symposium on Medical Science Held
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The 16th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Monday.
					Present there were Kim Hyong Hun, chairman of the Central Committee of the Medical Association of Korea, and officials, scientists and teachers in the field of public health.
					
					Kim Tae Sik, vice-chairman of the Korean Health Workers Association in Japan, members of the delegation of Korean medical workers in the U.S. led by Pak Ki Bom and other overseas Koreans were on hand.
					
					An opening address made by Kim Hyong Hun was followed by congratulatory speeches.
					
					A lecture titled "The DPRK's most advantageous women's healthcare system in the world" was given at the symposium.
					
					Its participants heard "Researches in establishment of telemedicine system in our country" and other papers.
					
					Speakers in their papers deeply explained the advanced research successes and experience gained in the course of introducing latest science and technology into preventing and treating diseases.

articles.title: Pyongyang Tourism College Established in DPRK
articles.content:
Pyongyang Tourism College Established in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Tourism College has been newly established in the DPRK. 
					 The college, which started its service on April 1 this year, aims to give professional education on tourism.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met O Hyon, a department director of the State General Bureau of Tourism.
					
					 O said:
					
					 The birth of Pyongyang Tourism College was prompted by the demand for the development of tourism in the country.
					
					 Its establishment is one of a series of measures taken by the government to develop tourism.
					
					 The college is planning to introduce the study-while-working system as well as the in-service training system.
					
					 It will also have various forms of exchange with foreign tourism educational institutions.
					
					 Faculties of tourism will come into being at normal universities in provinces of the country, including Wonsan University of Education and Cha Kwang Su Sinuiju University of Education No. 1.

articles.title: DPRK Pupils Place First at Int'l Concours
articles.content:
DPRK Pupils Place First at Int'l Concours
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK pupil Ma Sin A proved successful in the 9th international piano concours named after Rakhmaninov held in Russia from April 21 to 24.
					 It brought together scores of pupils from the DPRK, China, Finland and Russia.
					
					 It was held in the way of matching the skill between 7-16 year-old pupils specializing in piano, divided into the groups of ordinary music schools and music colleges.
					
					 Ma Sin A belonging to the group of music colleges excellently played compulsory pieces requiring refined playing and representation to be highly estimated and acclaimed by jury members and music fans.
					
					 Ma was awarded the certificate of the first prize at a closing ceremony of the concours.
					
					 DPRK 7 year-old pupil Choe Ji Ye came first in the 2013-2014 Henle Piano Concours held on internet.
					
					 It brought together 47 pupils from the DPRK, Germany, China and other countries.
					
					 Choe was awarded a certificate according to the result announced by the jury on April 23.

articles.title: Tradition of Unity Carried Forward in DPRK
articles.content:
Tradition of Unity Carried Forward in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- It has been 78 years after the birth of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland in Korea. It, founded by President Kim Il Sung on May 5, Juche 25 (1936), was the first anti-Japanese national united front in Korea.
					 The Association made great contributions to liberating Korea from Japan's colonial rule, as it helped rally the anti-Japanese forces of different social strata under the banner of patriotism and build up the driving forces of the Korean revolution.
					
					 This tradition of unity, established during the anti-Japanese struggle, has been creditably carried forward in the annals of national development.
					
					 After Korea's liberation on August 15, 1945, all its people turned out to build a new democratic country in hearty response to Kim Il Sung's call that those with strength should give strength, those with knowledge contribute knowledge and those with money donate money in doing so.
					
					 United close around the President, the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists, boasting of the strongest in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953 Korean War) and turned the country into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il opened up a new era of unity by creditably inheriting the revolutionary idea of the President.
					
					 When the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was undergoing the grim trials, he called upon all the people to strive in one mind and purpose for making the country more powerful and prosperous. In response to this appealing and patriotic call, they made a new history of thriving Korea after overcoming all difficulties.
					
					 Today the DPRK is making great innovations and rapid progress in the struggle for the final victory of the Songun (military-first) revolution under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who kindled the flame of displaying Kim Jong Il's patriotism in all aspects of society.
					
					 Rallied closer around their supreme leader, the DPRK people will surely build a thriving country of Juche, a highly-civilized socialist power.

articles.title: DPRK, Not Wavered by Any Pressure
articles.content:
DPRK, Not Wavered by Any Pressure
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its allies that consider the DPRK to be a thorn in their flesh are persistently resorting to the anti-DPRK moves.
					 However, the DPRK vigorously advances along the road it chose, under any grave situation caused by the U.S.-led imperialists, drawing deep attention of the international community.
					
					 In this regard, a Russian personage said: The harsher the U.S. clamps pressure, the stronger the DPRK people become and the more the U.S. gives nuclear threats, the stronger the DPRK people's striking capability grows, like Newton's third law of motion. This can be called "DPRK's political dynamics".
					
					 In actuality, the DPRK has answered a wave of U.S. challenges with its toughest counteractions.
					
					 The DPRK successfully carried out three rounds of nuclear tests to bolster up its nuclear deterrent in reaction to the sanctions and pressure tightened by the U.S. over its satellite launch for peaceful purpose.
					
					 Obama's recent tour of Asian region including south Korea for the U.S. Asia-Pacific strategy aimed at domination over the region sparked off another round of nuclear face-off between the DPRK and the U.S. He termed the defensive measures taken by the DPRK "provocation" and "threat", while crying out for harsher sanctions and pressure and "use of military force".
					
					 But the DPRK clarified its stand that it would continue bolstering up its nuclear deterrent and there is no statute of limitations to its declaration that it would not rule out a new form of nuclear test.
					
					 The U.S. policy-makers should ponder over the disastrous consequences to be entailed by the DPRK's exercise of the inviolable right to self-defence.

articles.title: Schoolchildren Eager to Enjoy Camping in Songdowon
articles.content:
Schoolchildren Eager to Enjoy Camping in Songdowon
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- All schoolchildren in the DPRK are delighted at the news that the Songdowon International Children's Camp has been reconstructed splendidly. 
					 In this regard, KCNA had interviews with school teachers and children.
					
					 Ji Un Gyong, a teacher of Pyongyang Janggyong Junior Secondary School, said:
					
					 All of students at my school were deeply moved to see the remodeled camp on TV. 
					
					 The luxurious camp is a token of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's deep love for the rising generations. 
					
					 All the schoolchildren are filled with the resolve to be better at study and organizational life, eager to be the first to enjoy camping there.
					
					 Choe Jong Im, a student of Phyongsong Junior Secondary School in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, said:
					
					 It's my earnest desire to lay the flowers cultivated at my home before the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing at the camp. 
					
					 Last year all my classmates spent an enjoyable time at the Munsu Water Park built in Pyongyang. The day is still in my memory.
					
					 Now, I feel very excited to picture myself spending a good time at the camp. So, I phoned my elder cousin brother to talk about my feelings and he told me he was of the same feelings.
					
					 Kim Un Ha, a staff member of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said:
					
					 A number of schools across the country have made phone calls asking when the Songdowon International Children's Camp would begin its service.
					
					 All of local schoolchildren as well as those in foreign countries are eagerly waiting for the days when they would enjoy themselves at the camp.

articles.title: Monstrous Crimes Committed by U.S. against Koreans Blasted
articles.content:
Monstrous Crimes Committed by U.S. against Koreans Blasted
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea and the North Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind GIs' Massacres on Monday released a memorandum disclosing the monstrous crimes and hideous human rights abuses perpetrated by the U.S. against the Korean nation for a long period.
					 According to it, the U.S. launched its aggression against Korea by infiltrating its aggressor ship General Sherman in 1866. This was followed by its ceaseless plunder and invasion by its Shenandoah and other warships in 1867, 1868 and 1871. 
					
					 Finding it hard to attain its aggressive purpose due to resistance of the Korean people, the U.S. sided with Japan during the 1894-1895 Sino-Japanese War and 1904-1905 Russo-Japanese War, openly supporting Japan's aggression of Korea. In 1905 the U.S. concluded the "Katsura-Taft Treaty" which recognized Japan's occupation of Korea, using it as a shock brigade for invading Korea. 
					
					 After occupying south Korea under the mask of "liberator" in September of 1945, the U.S. started its bestial atrocities against the Korean nation. 
					
					 It openly revealed its ambition for aggression of the DPRK and finally launched invasion of the DPRK on June 25, 1950. 
					
					 The U.S. suffered a disgraceful defeat in the Korean war but has fully turned south Korea into its colony and a tundra of human rights, keeping it under its occupation since the post-war period. 
					
					 It massively introduced all types of WMDs including nukes, turning south Korea into the world's biggest nuclear arsenal. 
					
					 It has staged ceaseless dangerous nuclear war drills for decades, posing constant danger of nuclear disaster to the Korean nation. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have committed unheard-of monstrous massacres of Koreans since they launched aggression against Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors killed Koreans by the cruelest and most brutal methods baffling human imagination during the Korean war.
					
					 During the Korean war, they killed at least 1.23 million people in the northern half of Korea and more than 1.24 million in south Korea.
					
					 They committed sexual abuses against Korean women to satisfy their carnal desire and mercilessly killed them even in the vortex of the war.
					
					 They committed hair-raising atrocities against many innocent people, lording it over south Korea after the war.
					
					 There occurred ceaseless GI crimes last year alone. To cite just a few examples, GIs gang-raped a woman in her twenties on a subway electric car, GIs made shooting spree against passers-by in the center of Seoul, driving their car over a local policeman before taking to flight and a drunken GI drove his car at breakneck speed, causing a traffic accident, and beat the victim who chased him.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists perpetrated barbarous air raids during the Korean war, massacring Koreans and reducing the country to ashes.
					
					 The flying corps of their air force made 800 000 sorties and those of their marines and navy over 250 000 sorties against the northern half of Korea in the entire period of the war. They dropped bombs and napalm bombs totaling almost 600 000 tons or 3.7 times those dropped over the Japan proper during the Pacific war.
					
					 Due to the U.S. barbarous air raids perpetrated during the Korean war 50 941 industrial establishments, 28 632 buildings of schools at all levels, 4 534 buildings of healthcare facilities including hospitals and clinics, 579 buildings of scientific research institutes, 8 163 buildings of media and cultural institutions and 2 077 226 dwelling houses were severely destroyed, 563 755 hectares of farmland devastated and 155 500 hectares of paddy and non-paddy fields decreased.
					
					 Environment was also seriously polluted due to the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' several decades-long presence in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. has desperately obstructed the reunification of Korea, blocked the independent development of the Korean nation and stood in the way of achieving its peace and prosperity.
					
					 The human and material damage done to the Korean nation by the U.S. aggression and crimes against humanity amounts to at least 114 trillion U.S. dollars.
					
					 The U.S. has committed too many crimes against the Korean nation to count for more than a hundred years, the memorandum said, adding there is no such country of barbarians in the world as the U.S.
					
					 The Korean nation will certainly settle accounts with the U.S., the sworn enemy, it warned.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Is Wholly to Blame for Sinking of Ferry: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Is Wholly to Blame for Sinking of Ferry: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- April 16 witnessed such a huge disaster that ferry Sewol sank in the waters off Jin Island of south Korea, claiming hundreds of casualties including students and other passengers.
					 This accident was, in a nutshell, the most terrible tragic man-made disaster caused by the Park Geun Hye regime's unpopular rule, incompetence and irresponsibility.
					
					 It was evidenced by the incompetent and irresponsible measures taken by the Park regime to cope with the disaster from the time of the occurrence of the accident to the operations staged for rescuing and searching those missing.
					
					 The Park regime has only been busy making much media publicity to the rescue measures. The regime, however, didn't take proper measures to conduct under-water searching operations at the very crucial moment more survivors could be saved.
					
					 Only six days after the sinking of the ferry, Park chaired a meeting of secretaries of Chongwadae to cope with the accident. And it didn't conduct operations to get access to the sunken ship to rescue survivors even four days later. Moreover, it failed to get a correct number of the passengers aboard the ship and the one of those rescued. It even got signatures from the divers who volunteered to join in the rescue operations for school children, warning them that the regime would not be responsible for death of any of them.
					
					 All these facts go to clearly prove that the disaster of ferry Sewol was an inevitable product of the incompetence and unpopular rule of the present south Korean regime.
					
					 What merits serious attention is the fact that no noticeable progress has been made in the operations conducted by the authorities since the occurrence of the accident. On the contrary, the ruling quarters are only vying with each other to shirk the blame for the accident.
					
					 It is worth recalling that Park cried out for severely punishing public officials at the meeting of secretaries of Chongwadae but excluded herself and her yesmen of Chongwadae from the list of punishment. At that time Park claimed the cause of the disaster seemed to be "murder-like behavior of the captain of the ferry". Meanwhile, those concerned of the regime asserted that the sinking of the ferry was caused by the abrupt turn of the ferry with cargoes more than treble the allowed weight aboard.
					
					 What the Park regime has done as regards the ferry disaster was that it blocked the infuriated bereaved families from going to Chongwadae.
					
					 Worse still, at a time when the whole of south Korea turned into a mourner's house due to the ferry's sinking, the Park regime invited its U.S. master to tour south Korea in violation of the human ethics and morality observed by Koreans generation after generation in a bid to boost cooperation and nexus with the U.S. in its campaign for slandering, threatening and blackmailing the DPRK.
					
					 When the mothers who lost their dear children, their families and tens of millions of other south Koreans were mourning over the untimely death of those youngsters, Park made such a disgusting sycophantic behavior as hosting a banquet for its U.S. master to please him. 
					
					 We cannot but question whether she is a human being and a woman before being "president" responsible for the destiny of the south Korean popular masses and whether she has even an iota of soul and spirit of the Korean nation.
					
					 Park is, indeed, a maniac of confrontation with compatriots and the worst pro-U.S. lackey surpassing the preceding south Korean rulers and the one of cold-blooded nature rare to be found in the world.
					
					 So many innocent south Korean people and school children fell victim to the wrong selection of Park as "president" of south Korea because she is the daughter of the "yusin" dictator, bereft of elementary feeling as a human being and humanity but engrossed in dictatorial and tyrannical rule only.
					
					 No one can vouch that the second and third disasters like the one of ferry Sewol would not occur as long as such woman who is utterly ignorant of philosophy or politics, a depraved old lady who has neither human ethics nor conscience and the worst traitor and sycophant as Park is allowed to stay in office. 
					
					 If Park is allowed to go scot-free, not only the south Korean society but all Koreans will not be able to escape manifold disasters and misfortunes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Ultra-right Politicians' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Ultra-right Politicians' Visit to Yasukuni Shrine
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Japanese chief executive donated a tree called Sakaki to Yasukuni Shrine in the name of the "prime minister". Timed to coincide with this offering, the minister of Internal Affairs and 146 lawmakers of Japan paid a group visit to the shrine.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is absurd sophism for the Japanese authorities to claim that they honored the memory of fallen fighters and the visit to the shrine would continue in the future, too, as Japan wishes for world peace. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities' attitude toward the issue of the shrine is a touchstone to distinguish whether Japan stands for a war or peace.
					
					 The shrine serves as what embellishes a war of aggression. 
					
					 Entombed in the shrine are memorial tablets of top-class Second World War criminals. Therefore, their visit to it cannot but be construed otherwise than an attempt to embellish a war for aggression.
					
					 If Japan truly wants peace, it should properly understand the history of militarist aggression, seriously reflect on it and draw the line of distinction to break with militarism.
					
					 However, Japan is pushing ahead with its moves to turn it into a militarist and war state in real earnest.
					
					 The Japanese chief executive kicked off a strong wind of militarism at the outset of the year, vociferating that a battle has started now to regain the position of "strong Japan." 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seeking to hurl Japanese armed with the idea of militarism into overseas aggression by stirring up the fever of militarism through visits to the shrine.
					
					 They are, however, seriously mistaken. If Japan rushes headlong into the lurch to the Right, intoxicated with scent of the revival of militarism, it will not be able to escape another miserable defeat.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Aggressor, Provocateur
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Aggressor, Provocateur
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- It is nonsensical and can never be justified that the United States is talking about the "provocation" and "threat" from the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The story about "provocation of north Korea" is an unpardonable insult and challenge to the dignified DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has been a state of aggression and plunder since its birth.
					
					 The history of the U.S. imperialists is recorded with bloody traces such as aggression, plunder and killings of innocent people. They ignited the Korean war in the 50s, Vietnamese war in the 60s and 70s, invaded Grenada and Panama in the 80s and unleashed the Persian Gulf war and Balkan war in the 90s, trampling down the sovereignty of various countries and nations, killing innocent people and wrecking peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. aggression and war against the DPRK reached the climax in their provocative nature.
					
					 The present U.S. chief executive clamored about the "change" in his policy toward the DPRK before taking office, but it was an empty talk. On the contrary, the U.S. threat and provocation against the DPRK have been further intensified.
					
					 The threat and provocation are going beyond the phase of danger this year.
					
					 It is a shame that the U.S. labeling the DPRK's measure for self-defense as "provocation" while escalating tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Now that south Korea has turned into the U.S. largest nuclear outpost and biggest mobile nuclear arsenal in the Far East, the DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear deterrent as it is designated as the target of nuclear attack by the nuclear warmongers. No one has the right to criticize it.
					
					 The aggression and plunder by the U.S. imperialists have become more hideous in their nature and their armed interference and war for aggression also more belligerent.
					
					 The U.S. tries to make a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK while resorting to provocations against it and swallow up the whole of the Korean peninsula the way it ignited the Korean war in the past century and the way it invaded sovereign states in the new century, but it is seriously mistaken.
					
					 With no intrigue can the U.S. imperialists cover up its true colors as provocateur and aggressor on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Int'l Body Issues Appeal to Commemorate Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary
articles.content:
Int'l Body Issues Appeal to Commemorate Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary
Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea made public an appeal to foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people on April 25 on the occasion of the 20th demise anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The appeal said that the President is deeply revered and remembered by the Korean people and the world progressive people as greatest man who made the 20th century the era of independence.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea appeal to foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people, deeming it an obligation and a duty of the world progressives to highly praise the President and widely disseminate his undying feats.
					
					 First, let's form committees for remembering the President in regions and countries on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise and arrange colorful events of praising him to suit their specific conditions so as to make an atmosphere of highly praising him prevail in the world!
					
					 Second, let's hold an international Internet seminar on the great career and undying feats of the President to be participated in by the delegates of the remembrance committees in regions and countries and the foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people!
					
					 The seminar will be held late in June or earlier in July.
					
					 Third, let's praise the President on many occasions in the future, too, as in the past and give full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country, true to the lofty intention of the President and leader Kim Jong Il!
					
					 The committee will wage more brisk activities for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people by making good use of all conditions and possibilities and make a positive contribution to the accomplishment of the cause of global independence desired by the President together with the world progressive people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral a difunto Novichenko, soldado internacionalista ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral a difunto Novichenko, soldado internacionalista ruso
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio una ofrenda floral al difunto soldado internacionalista ruso, Ya. T. Novichenko con motivo del centenario de su cumpleanos.
					Tuvo lugar el 27 de abril en la aldea Travnoye del distrito de Dobolensk, tierra natal de Novichenko el acto de colocacion de ofrenda floral y transmision de las palabras de saludo cordial del Mariscal enviadas a las familias del difunto. 
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los familiares del difunto, los funcionarios de la region de Novosibirsk y el distrito de Dobolensk, los periodistas del centro y localidad, la delegacion del Instituto de Historia del Partido del Comite Central de Partido del Trabajo de Corea, encabezada por su subdirector Ri Sok Ryul, el embajador coreano Kim Yong Jae y los demas funcionarios de la embajada coreana en Rusia y los funcionarios de la rama de construccion que trabajan en Rusia.
					
					Primero, fue depositada ante la tumba de Ya. T. Novichenko la ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal.
					
					El jefe de la delegacion coreana transmitio las palabras de saludo enviadas por el Mariscal a los familiares del difunto.
					
					En el acto hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores no ocultaron su profunda emocion ante la camaraderia revolucionaria y la obligacion moral internacionalista del Mariscal, igual al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y expresaron el sentimiento de respeto y veneracion hacia el Mariscal.
					
					Los familiares del difunto dijeron derramando lagrimas de emocion que Novichenko esta vivo como heroico soldado internacionalista conocido por todo el mundo gracias a los grandes lideres de Corea y rindieron el saludo de agradecimiento al Mariscal.
					
					Al termino del acto, los participantes pasaron revista a la tumba de Novichenko, reconstruido magnificamente bajo la benevolencia del Mariscal.

articles.title: Tiene lugar XVI Seminario de Ciencias Medicas de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tiene lugar XVI Seminario de Ciencias Medicas de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang el XVI Seminario de Ciencias Medicas de Pyongyang de Compatriotas en el interior y exterior del pais. 
					Participaron el presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de Medicos de Corea, Kim Hyong Hun, y los funcionarios, cientificos y profesores de la rama de la salud publica, asi como el vicepresidente de la Asociacion de Medicos Coreanos Residentes en Japon, Kim Tae Sik, la delegacion de medicos coreanos residentes en Estados Unidos presidida por Pak Ki Bom y otros compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					Kim Hyong Hun pronuncio la palabra de apertura y hubo discursos de felicitacion. 
					
					En la ocasion se impartio la leccion intitulada "El sistema mas ventajoso en el mundo de nuestro pais para la atencion de salud de las mujeres".
					
					Y se presentaron las disertaciones que explican los exitos y experiencias adquiridos en la aplicacion de las ciencias y tecnicas de punta en la prevencion y tratamiento de enfermedades.

articles.title: ?Quien es autor de catastrofe de barco "Sewol"?, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
?Quien es autor de catastrofe de barco "Sewol"?, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- El 16 de abril, el barco de pasajeros "Sewol" se hundio en el mar frente a la isla Jin del Sur de Corea, debido a lo cual se sepultaron en el mar unos cientos de alumnos y pasajeros.
					El presente caso es un gran accidente horrible y la calamidad humana generados por la politica anti-popular, la incapacidad y la irresponsabilidad del "poder" de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Lo comprueban la incapacidad de la administracion de crisis y el proceder irresponsable tomados por la banda de Park desde el surgimiento del accidente,  el socorro de los perdidos hasta el trabajo de busqueda.
					
					Esta vez, el "gobierno" de Park se apresuro solamente a informar ruidosamente a traves de la prensa de las medidas de salvacion.
					
					Pero en el mas importante tiempo para salvar a los sobrevivientes, no realizo el trabajo de busqueda submarina.
					
					La gobernadora titere convoco la reunion de secretarios superiores despues de pasar 6 dias desde el surgimiento del incidente y no organizo la entrada en el barco para salvar a los sobrevivientes aunque transcurrio 3 dias, el "gobierno" no totalizo ni controlo debidamente el numero de los embarcados y los salvados y  recibio desde los buceadores que participaban voluntariamente en el trabajo para salvar a los alumnos la firma con el contenido de que si ellos fallan en el socorro, la autoridad no se responsabilizara del resultado.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran que la presente catastrofe deviene el producto inevitable causado por la incapacidad y el proceder anti-popular de las autoridades actuales.
					
					Lo ridiculo es que a partir del surgimiento del incidente hasta la fecha no hay el avance en el trabajo de socorro de las autoridades y las fuerzas gobernantes intentan eludir a porfia la responsabilidad.
					
					En la reunion de secretarios superiores de Chongwadae, Park Geun-hye abogo por castigar severamente a los funcionarios publicos, pero excluyo de su objeto a si misma y Chongwadae.
					
					Y dijo que ocurrio el accidente porque "el capitan del barco actuo como asesino".
					
					Ademas los relacionados con el "gobierno" explicaron que la razon del hundimiento del buque de pasajeros reside en la rotacion repentina de barco y el cargamento de mas de 3 veces que su capacidad.
					
					El trabajo que el "gobierno" de Park hizo esta vez, es que obstaculizo el camino de los familiares de las victimas hacia Chongwadae. 
					
					Cuando todo el territorio surcoreano estuvo de luto, invito a su amo gringo, en contra de la etica y moralidad de la nacion coreana, para recrudecer la confabulacion anti-RPDC, amenazar y chantajear a esta parte connacional.
					
					Mientras expresaban condolencias decenas de millones de surcoreanos, inclusive las madres y los familiares de los alumnos muertos tan temprano, deplorando la muerte de estos, Park Geun-hye, enviciada del servilismo a grandes potencias, ofrecio banquetes preparados con los impuestos pagados por el pueblo para adular a su amo gringo.
					
					Se puede decir que ella no es humana ni mujer ni mucho menos la "presidenta" que supuestamente se responsabiliza por el destino de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Ella no tiene ni una pizca de espiritu nacional.
					
					Park Geun-hye es la maniaca de enfrentamiento fratricida peor que los ex gobernantes titeres, lacaya proyanqui y animal de sangre fria sin par en el mundo.
					
					Por haber elegido como "presidenta" a la hija del dictador de "renovacion", numerosos hombres inocentes y alumnos pierden la vida.
					
					Mientras exista Park Geun-hye, ignorante de la filosofia y la politica, corrupta inmoral y vendepatria, no hay la garantia de que no se repitan los accidentes como la tragedia del barco "Sewol".
					
					Si perdonan a la responsable principal de la tragedia, la sociedad surcoreana y toda la nacion coreana sufriran desastres y desgracias continuos.

articles.title: EE.UU. no puede ocultar su naturaleza de agresor y provocador, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. no puede ocultar su naturaleza de agresor y provocador, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 5 de mayo (ACNC) -- Aunque Estados Unidos habla con bombo y platillo de la "provocacion" y la "amenaza" provenientes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, no podra justificar de ninguna manera este sofisma.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					El rumor de la "provocacion del Norte de Corea" es intolerable insulto y desafio a la digna RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. es el Estado agresor y saqueador de nacimiento.
					
					Su historia esta manchada de sangre de los pueblos inocentes.
					
					El imperio desato en la decada de 1950 la guerra coreana, en las decadas de 1960 y 1970 la vietnamita, en la de 1980 la agresion armada contra Granadas y Panama y en la de 1990 la guerra del Golfo Persico y la Balcanica.
					
					En esas guerras, asesino a numerosos habitantes inocentes violando la soberania de varios paises y naciones y perturbaron la paz y la seguridad.
					
					Las acciones agresivas y belicas contra Corea llegan al climax en su caracter provocativo.
					
					Aunque el actual presidente norteamericano preconizaba del "cambio" de la politica sobre la RPDC ya antes de su llegada al poder, se tornaron mas graves la amenaza y la provocacion de EE.UU. contra ella.
					
					Este ano, sobrepasan el limite de peligro la amenaza y la provocacion anti-RPDC.
					
					Agravando intencionalmente por una parte la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. acusa cinicamente las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC como "actos provocadores".
					
					Puesto que el territorio surcoreano se ha convertido en la base avanzada nuclear y el arsenal nuclear movil del Extremo Oriente y la RPDC es definida como blanco por los maniacos de guerra nuclear, nadie puede criticar el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de ella.
					
					El imperio intenta ocupar toda la Peninsula Coreana con el ataque preventivo y sorpresivo repitiendo el metodo usado al desatar en el siglo pasado la pasada guerra coreana y ocupar en el nuevo siglo con las fuerzas armadas los Estados soberanos. 
					
					El imperialismo norteamericano esta equivocado en eso y no podra encubrir jamas su naturaleza de provocador y agresor en la Peninsula Coreana.
